errors.noBotToken: No Bot Token found! please add BOT_TOKEN in .env file
errors.notInGuild: This command can only be used in a guild!
errors.notInVoice: You must be in a voice channel to use this command!
errors.noPermission: You do not have permission to use this command!
errors.botNoPermission: I do not have permission to view channel or send messages!
errors.cantJoin: I can't join that voice channel!
errors.alreadyInVoice: I am already in a voice channel!

command.joinDescription: Joins the voice channel you are currently in or the channel specified by the argument
command.leaveDescription: Leaves the voice channel I am currently in
command.playDescription: Plays the song specified by the argument
command.playArguments: Song to play (URL or Search Query)
command.loopDescription: loops the currently playing song or the queue
command.loopArguments: loop the current song or the queue
command.volumeDescription: Changes the volume of the player
